description.en: STP is an ecosystem optimzed for DAOs. It launched Verse Network, a full suite of native tools and infrastructures facilitating efficient decentralized decision-making for users, communities and organizations to streamline the creation and management of DAOs. Through Verse Network, users can access a suite of no-code DAO tools to launch and manage their DAOs on a range of blockchains.

ico_data.short_desc: Standard tokenization protocol allows tokenization of assets in a manner that makes them fully compliant across jurisdictions and transferable across any platform of blockchain.
